definitions.definition: Any weather phenomenon consisting of a system of winds rotating around a centre of low atmospheric pressure ; a low pressure system.
A tropical cyclone occurring in the South Pacific or Indian Ocean .
The more or less violent, small-scale circulations such as tornadoes , waterspouts , and dust devils .
A cyclone separator ; the cylindrical vortex tube within such a separator

main_definition: ( loosely ) Any weather phenomenon consisting of a system of winds rotating around a centre of low atmospheric pressure ; a low pressure system.
secondary_definitions: ( specifically ) A tropical cyclone occurring in the South Pacific or Indian Ocean .
( informal ) The more or less violent, small-scale circulations such as tornadoes , waterspouts , and dust devils .
A cyclone separator ; the cylindrical vortex tube within such a separator
